Posts.Content: Suzie67 wrote: I am 40 and have recently been diagnosed with lobular invasive breast cancer and have undergone a mastectomy and sentinel lymph node biopsy - now the results say it has spread to the lymph nodes and have to have another op to remove all the lymph nodes and do chemo - has anyone else had lymph node involvement as it all sounds very scary.   Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Lymph Node Removal Suzie67 myheidiscrapbooking
